segments.text: Do you have any plan to buy a house in this city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely we need a house here . But what makes me upset is the prices in this city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our monthly salary can not buy one square meter of the house here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is depressing to hear the price goes higher and higher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: More and more people need to buy houses , but the market can not meet the needs , so this caused the bubble in real estate industry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the rich still wants to buy more , even though they have at least one house to live .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you watched the TV series , Humble Abode ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it displays some social problems and interprets the values of our white-collars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really , really want a house , even though it is small like a snail house .
segments.speaker: S1
